original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī aññatarissā itthiyā kulūpikā hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī aññatarissā itthiyā kulūpikā hoti

original: Atha kho sā itthī taṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho sā itthī tam bhikkhunim etat avoca

original: “handāyye, imaṁ saṅghāṇiṁ amukāya nāma itthiyā dehī”ti.
analyzed: handāyye imam saṅghāṇim amukāya nāma itthiyā dehi iti

original: “sacāhaṁ pattena ādāya gacchāmi vissaro me bhavissatī”ti paṭimuñcitvā agamāsi.
analyzed: sacā aham pattena ādāya gacchāmi vissaraḥ me bhavissati iti paṭimuñcitvā agamāsi

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo saṅghāṇiṁ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ saṅghāṇim dhāressanti seyyathā api gihiniyaḥ kāmabhoginiyaḥ ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhunī saṅghāṇim dhāressati iti pe
saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhunī saṅghāṇim dhāreti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī saṅghāṇiṁ dhāressati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhunī saṅghāṇim dhāressati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu
yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghāṇim dhāreyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
